title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 19, ch. XV - Local Government Services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 19, ch. XV - Local Government Services

State Regulations

Part 800 - Repealed

Part 801 - Repealed

Part 802 - Repealed

Part 803 - Repealed

Part 804 - Repealed

Part 805 - Repealed

Part 810 - Frank C. Moore Local Government Achievement Awards (§ 810.1 to 810.8)

Part 811 - State Aid For Comprehensive Studies And Reports Under General Municipal Law, Article 5-j (§ 811.1 to 811.16)

Part 812 - State Aid For The Development And Revision Of County Charters Under Municipal Home Rule Law, Section 38 (§ 812.1 to 812.13)

Part 813 - State Aid For The Development And Revision Of City Charters Under Municipal Home Rule Law, Section 38 (§ 813.1 to 813.13)

Part 814 - Shared Municipal Services Incentive Awards (§ 814.1 to 814.6)

Part 815 - Local Government Efficiency Award (§ 815.1 to 815.6)

Part 816 - Local Government Performance And Efficiency Program (§ 816.1 to 816.8)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 19, ch. XV
The powers and duties of the Office of Charities Registration
were transferred to the Department of Law pursuant to chapter 83 of the Laws of
1995. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
